#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;

ll ar[100009];
ll sri[100009][500];

int main() {
	// your code goes here
   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
   cin.tie(NULL); cout.tie(NULL);
	
	ll i,j,n,u,a,b;
	
	const ll fix=450;
	cin>>n>>u;
	
	for(i=0;i<u;i++)
	{
	cin>>a>>b;
	if(a>=fix)
	{
	    for(j=b;j<=n;j+=a)
	    ar[j]++;
	}
	else
	{
	    sri[b][a]++;
	}
	}
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
	    for(j=1;j<fix;j++)
	    {
	        ar[i]+=sri[i][j];
	        if(i+j<=n)
	        {
	            sri[i+j][j]+=sri[i][j];
	        }
	    }
	    cout<<ar[i]<<" ";
	}
	
	
	return 0;
}
